attractions.name: Downtown Shopping District
attractions.description: Explore our vibrant downtown area with unique boutiques, restaurants, and entertainment venues.

attractions.name: Weekly Farmers Market
attractions.description: Fresh local produce, artisan foods, and handcrafted goods from regional vendors. Open Saturdays, 8am-1pm.

attractions.name: Technology Innovation Center
attractions.description: Our state-of-the-art facility supporting local tech startups and entrepreneurs.

attractions.name: Dash City Museum
attractions.description: Discover the rich heritage and cultural history of our region through interactive exhibits.

attractions.name: Riverside Park
attractions.description: Beautiful outdoor space with walking trails, picnic areas, and seasonal events along the riverfront.

attractions.name: Dash Performing Arts Center
attractions.description: Home to our local theater company, symphony orchestra, and various cultural performances.

attractions.name: Sunset Winery
attractions.description: Award-winning local winery offering tours, tastings, and special events with stunning valley views.

attractions.name: Mountain View Golf Club
attractions.description: 18-hole championship golf course with panoramic mountain views and full-service clubhouse.
